column4: jinxed: If it is just to be used for sharing between linux and windoze, I would recommend to format it to ext3 filesystem from linux, then use to access it from some windoze box the driver for ext3 at www.fs-driver.org
jinxed: Writing to ext3 from windoze is better and safer than writing to ntfs from linux
jinxed: How do you format the disk?
writing to ntfs using fuse is safe, ive done it from osX using macfuse quite a few times
